author: Ben Shimkus
title: SpaceX is leaning into the moon. Here's why.

author: Beatrice Nolan
title: X-odus: Half of xAI’s founding team has left Elon Musk’s AI company, potentially complicating his plans for a blockbuster SpaceX IPO
description: xAI has lost two cofounders and six other AI researchers in recent weeks as it has merged with SpaceX.

author: John Kell
title: Steelcase’s CTO says the AI boom will reshape office design
description: The dot-com wave led to the embrace of open-floor concepts. As AI usage explodes, Steelcase's Steve Miller believes the office will need to be redesigned yet again.
content: Steve Miller joined office furniture manufacturer Steelcase in 1999 as a software developer, coinciding with the tail end of the dot-com boom times that birthed future tech giants like Amazon and eBa… [+12317 chars]

author: Lillian Rizzo
title: Scripps launches cost cutting, AI integration in latest effort to generate earnings growth
description: CEO Adam Symson said in an interview with CNBC the changes are intended to alleviate journalists from administrative tasks, but not replace them with AI.
content:
